Author: dynamicsystem
Text: You’re not disgusting love!  A bmi of 23.5 is not big at all, and even if it was, the size of your body does not designate your worth! Your body sends you hunger cues because it is trying to keep you well nourished. Is there something you could do to relax, like putting on a tv show or making some tea? I hope you feel better soon!

Author: snefferu
Text: Put some music on, take some slow breaths, do some stretches, go for a walk, get hugs from your bf or a friend. Ride this out, it’ll be ok.
